scripts.cp: cp ../packages/core/dist/index.es.js ./static/core.es.js && cp ../packages/ui/dist/index.es.js ./static/ui.es.js && cp ../packages/hls/dist/index.es.js ./static/hls.es.js &&  cp ../packages/dash/dist/index.es.js ./static/dash.es.js && cp ../packages/danmaku/dist/index.es.js ./static/danmaku.es.js && cp ../packages/mpegts/dist/index.es.js ./static/mpegts.es.js
scripts.sed: sed -i 's/@oplayer\/core/\/core\.es\.js/' ./static/ui.es.js && sed -i 's/@oplayer\/core/\/core.es.js/' ./static/danmaku.es.js && sed -i 's/hls.js\/dist\/hls.light.min.js/https:\/\/cdn.skypack.dev\/hls.js@v1.2.3/' ./static/hls.es.js && sed -i 's/hls.js\/dist\/hls.min.js/https:\/\/cdn.skypack.dev\/hls.js@v1.2.3/' ./static/hls.es.js && sed -i 's/"dashjs"/"https:\/\/cdn.skypack.dev\/dashjs"/' ./static/dash.es.js && sed -i 's/mpegts.js\/dist\/mpegts.js/https:\/\/cdn.skypack.dev\/mpegts.js/' ./static/mpegts.es.js
scripts.prebuild: yarn run cp && yarn run sed
